body:
TeamSpeak isn't working when I try login to Avicus, it just says. "Failed to resolve hostname" Is this just me? Or is this for other people as well?

If this is spam, feel free to lock this. My apologies if it is.

title: TeamSpeak 3 currently down?

replies.body: Yes. Its down for me too.
replies.body_tagged: Yes. Its down for me too.

replies.body: It is down, I was not able to connect about an hour and a half ago.
replies.body_tagged: It is down, I was not able to connect about an hour and a half ago.

replies.body: The teamspeak server tends to go down time from time.  It usually comes back on later in the day.
replies.body_tagged: The teamspeak server tends to go down time from time.  It usually comes back on later in the day.

replies.body: Yes the TeamSpeak is down however we are trying to resolve the issues swiftly.
replies.body_tagged: Yes the TeamSpeak is down however we are trying to resolve the issues swiftly.

replies.body:
I don't think the Teamspeak server is down, it says: "Can't resolve hostname", not "Can't reach server".
Ivy probably forgot to pay for his domain!1!!1

replies.body: That joke is a bit dumb, but it does say 'Can't resolve hostname', so, apparently it is the domain, not the TeamSpeak server, so.... yea.
